body.p: The SpaceRescue game works with sentence functions.

section.title: Begin to play
section.p: Activate the Java window and press the F2 key on your keyboard.

section.title: Sentence code
section.p: You may choose a sentence set or a specific set by typing its code, e.g. SMEA143. In that case you may not register your result. The sentence sets are SMEA, SMEB ja SMEC.

section.title: Playing
section.p: The sentence becomes visible. The bad octopuses are watching the words. Your goal is to rescue the sentence constituents and give them names. The game has three phases.

section.title: 1. phase
section.p: You start out with five jet fighters which you can steer with the arrow keys. My may shoot at the octopuses with laser if you press the space key. You are supposed to shoot down all octopuses watching the word belonging to the same constituent. If you shoot agenst an octopyussy not belonging to the constituent in question, all the octopuses will shoot at you and try to destroy your jet fighter.You then have to move your fighter in order to protect it.

section.title: 2. phased
section.p: When you have rescued a sentence constituent, you send a rescue ship on order torescue it. You only have 10 rescue ships. If you send a rescue ship too early 8before you have freed a whole phrase) the octopuses may destroy the rescue ship.

section.title: 3. lávki
section.p: Go leat gádjon cealkkalahtu, de válljet rivttes funkšuvnna (subjeavtta, verbála jnv.) - listu lea olgeš ravddas spealus. Don sirddát bajásguvlui A-boaluin, ja vulosguvlui D-boaluin. Go leat markeren rivttes funkšuvnna, de deaddilat S.
Jus lea rivttes funkšuvdna, de gádjunláivi girdila cealkkalahtuin ja bidjá dan rivttes sadjái ovttas funkšuvnnain. Cealkkalahttu ruoniha.

Jus lea válljen boastto funkšuvnna, de leahkkaguolit fallehit du ja bilidit ovtta du ruoná galbbain. Juohke cealkkalahtus maid don leat gádjon, leat guokte rukses galbba, nubbi lea dan bajábealde, nubbi fas vuolábealde. Dát máksá ahte dus leat guokte vejolašvuođa válljet rivttes funkšuvnna. Jus guktii meattát, de gádjunláivi bieđgana. Dalle dihtor čájeha dutnje rivttes funkšuvnna ja cealkkalahttu ruvssoda.

ul.li: A ("Ascend"): Dáinna sirddát bajás go áiggut válljet rivttes funkšuvnna.
D("Descend"): Dáinna sirddát vulos go áiggut válljet rivttes funkšuvnna.
S("Send"): Dáinna sáddet rivttes funkšuvnna gádjunláivái.

section.title: Čuoggát
section.p: Don oaččut 10 čuoggá juohke sáni ovddas maid leat čatnan rivttes cealkkalahttui. Go olles cealkkalahttu lea biddjon oktii ja don čanat dan rivttes funkšuvdnii, de cealkkalahtu čuokkismearri duppalastojuvvo. Jus don geahččalat čatnat dasa sáni mii ii gula cealkkalahttui, de massát 5 čuoggá. Vai don duođaid beasat gillát, de leahkkaguolit vel báhčet du ala jus don dagat dan. Sirdde soahtegirdi njuolaiguin amaset leahkkaguolit deaivat du.

section.title: Ođđa cealkka
section.p: Go leat geargan, de sáhtát deaddilit R ja oažžut ođđa cealkaga. Dalle gádjunláivi doalvu válmmaš cealkaga gomuvuhtii, ja buktá dutnje ođđa.

section.title: Menylinnjá
section.p: Game-menyas don sáhtát bissehit spealu jus válljet "Stop Game". Don sáhtát maid geahččat spealu bohtosiid jus válljet "Highscore". Dát funkšuvdna lea vejolaš válljet dušše válljet ovdal go álggát speallat, ja maŋŋil.
Settings-menyas don sáhtát jáddadit jiena, dahje bidjat ala jus válljet "Sound effects".

Help-menyas "Introduction" vuolde de gávnnat speallanrávvagiid. Don sáhtát maid válljet "Toturial" go ofelastojuvvo spealu čađa. Jus válljet "About", de oaččut diehtit nama ja e-boasta-čujuhusa daidda geat leat ráhkadan spealu.
